row.title: Contributions to Slo Music
row.link_name: The music scene in SLO is growing, but it may be leaving Cal Poly students out of mind
row.desc: Long-form feature story on local San Luis Obispo venues and their lack of support for local student bands written in 2020. This was the first of many stories focused on the local music scene and served as part one of a two-part series.

row.title: Beat Reporting
row.link_name: New plant conservatory breaks ground after being torn down for new building
row.desc: This short form story was written while serving as a temporary beat reporter for Mustang News as part of my journalism curriculum, eventually running in the print edition of the paper.

row.title: Political Reporting
row.link_name: County Officials Call for Emergency Action to End New Oil and Gas Drilling
row.desc: The article features an interview with the then mayor of San Luis Obispo Heidi Harmon.

row.title: Content Manager
row.desc: From August 2020 to December 2021 I served as the supervising content manager for the CJ Silas Show, where I worked with other interns to curate, schedule, and upload legacy content for the showâ€™s Youtube channel.

row.title: Script Schedule
row.link_name: The CJ Silas Show Script Example
row.desc: Designed, proposed, and set into motion in a week, the CJ Silas Show youtube channel schedule was the result of collaboration with other interns on the team with an acute focus on unarchived footage and maintaining relevancy to the modern-day sports news cycle.

row.title: Apple Farm Cellar Layout
row.desc: As a marketplace and cellar representative, I worked with local farmers, winemakers, and distillers to ensure quality informative experiences of their products, while also utilizing Adobe InDesign to optimize store layout and inventory processes.
